_description: The soul of the Christian likened to gold — seven monorhyming lines in John Grimestone’s sermon notes following ‘Sic in anima debet esse’

NLS18721.First Lines:
Clernesse of vnderstondinggeRichesse of grace þat is
                    folwingge…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Worþinesse of good doynggeHeuinesse of stedefast
                    liuingge
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 6-7.
